thread.section_title: Snowgoose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snowgoose | snowgoose.com.au
thread.title: Mel, Venture Films
thread.title_full: Snowgoose reviewed by Mel, Venture Films

author: Mel, Venture Films
title: Mel, Venture Films
text: I found Snowgoose to offer very personalised customer service. The best part was that the cherry boxes we had sent out were top notch. Our clients absolutely loved them. They were something different and the branded lids meant that everyone was clear about who sent them and they were certainly impressed. Thanks very much Snowgoose, I look forward to doing business with you agin.
